items.question: What is the best Brainrot in Steal a Brainrot?
items.answer: The top-performing Brainrot Roblox game is Strawberry Elephant, an OG unit that generates the best income. However, in some versions of the game, like this one, Los Bros is the one.

items.question: What is the rarest Brainrot in Steal a Brainrot?
items.answer: The rarest brainrots are those belonging to the Brainrot God and Secret tiers. Some of them are Odin Din Din Dun (Brain God) and, especially, Los Bros (Secret).

items.question: How do I get new Brainrots?
items.answer: You can either purchase them or steal them from others. To buy a new Brainrot, you need to make sure that you have enough funds and space in your base.

items.question: Are there different rarities of Brainrots?
items.answer: Yes, Brainrots come in different rarities, each with unique looks and higher value.

items.question: Where to play Steal Brainrot online?
items.answer: Visit https://stealabrainrot.quest to enjoy Steal a Brainrot for free; no downloads, installs, or sign-ups are required.

cta.title: It's Time to Steal a Brainrot!
cta.body: Ready to buy and steal brainrot to fill your base with just top-performing characters? Play Steal a Brainrot today, collect as many Brainrots as you can, and have fun!
